about_us: Case covers in a range of colors to suit any style.
Premium case covers to protect your LinkBuds Fit earbuds.1
Packaged in sustainable material to minimize the environmental impact.3

Select your style: Tailor and protect your LinkBuds Fit1 with a fitted Case Cover, in a range of colors to suit any style2.
Choose your color: Select your favorite premium matte color from five options: Ash Blue, Ash Green, Ash Violet, Ash Pink and Pure Black. The case covers are easy to mix and match, allowing you to customize based on your style each day.1,2
Matching packaging: Your case cover will arrive in packaging that matches the color you selected. The packaging is made of sustainable material, reflecting our commitment to minimizing the environmental impact of our products.3
features: Sony is committed not only to offering products, services and content that deliver exciting experiences but also to working towards our goal of a zero environmental footprint throughout our business activities.
